mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ticket WHERE status = #{status} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT AVG(tr.evaluation_score) FROM t_ticket_record tr INNER JOIN t_ticket t ON tr.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE tr.evaluation_score IS NOT NULL AND tr.is_deleted = 0 AND t.is_deleted = 0

SELECT DATE(t.create_time) as date, COUNT(t.ticket_id) as new_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) as completed_count FROM t_ticket t WHERE t.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND t.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY DATE(t.create_time) ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT tt.type_name, COUNT(t.ticket_id) as count, ROUND(COUNT(t.ticket_id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_ticket WHERE is_deleted = 0), 2) as proportion FROM t_ticket t INNER JOIN t_ticket_type tt ON t.type_id = tt.type_id WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND tt.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY tt.type_id, tt.type_name ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT t.ticket_id, t.title, t.status, COALESCE(tt.type_name, '-') as type_name, t.create_by as creator_id, COALESCE(t.processor_id, -1) as processor_id, t.priority, t.create_time as createTime, COALESCE(u.real_name, '-') as creator_name, COALESCE(d.department_name, '-') as department_name, COALESCE(processor.real_name, '未分配') as processor_name FROM t_ticket t LEFT JOIN t_user u ON t.create_by = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_ticket_type tt ON t.type_id = tt.type_id LEFT JOIN t_user processor ON t.processor_id = processor.user_id LEFT JOIN t_department d ON t.department_id = d.department_id WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
